{"id":513657376,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1624748969,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/513657376/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Distinct Islands","memory":"27.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int visited[100][100];\n    int numDistinctIslands(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        set <string> uniqueislands;\n        int r = grid.size();\n        int c = grid[0].size();\n        if( c==0 )\n            return 0;\n        int visited[r+1][c+1];\n        memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<r;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<c;j++){\n                string temp=\"\";\n                \n                if(grid[i][j] ==1 && visited[i][j] ==0){\n                     dfs(grid,i,j,i,j,temp);\n                }\n                \n                if(temp.size() != 0)\n                uniqueislands.insert(temp);            \n                temp=\"\";\n               \n            }\n        }\n        return uniqueislands.size();\n    }\n    void dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid ,int i,int j,int r,int c,string &temp){\n        int n = grid.size();int m = grid[0].size();\n        if(i< 0 || j<0 || i>=n || j>= m){\n            return;\n        }\n        if(visited[i][j] ||  grid[i][j] == 0){\n            return ;\n        }\n        visited[i][j] =1;\n        temp+=to_string(r-i)+to_string(c-j);\n        \n        \n        dfs(grid,i+1,j,r,c,temp);\n        dfs(grid,i-1,j,r,c,temp);\n        dfs(grid,i,j+1,r,c,temp);\n        dfs(grid,i,j-1,r,c,temp);\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-distinct-islands"}
